thread.title: Trump says Giuliani will 'get his facts straight'

title: Trump says Giuliani will 'get his facts straight'
text:
Trump says Giuliani will 'get his facts straight' 8:30pm BST - 01:35
U.S. President Donald Trump said Friday that his new chief lawyer, Rudy Giuliani, is ''a great guy'' and ''he'll get his facts straight,'' following a series of curious interviews by the former New York mayor, in which he claimed Trump paid back his lawyer Michael Cohen for a $130,000 payment made to porn star Stormy Daniels. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
U.S. President Donald Trump said Friday that his new chief lawyer, Rudy Giuliani, is "a great guy" and "he'll get his facts straight," following a series of curious interviews by the former New York mayor, in which he claimed Trump paid back his lawyer Michael Cohen for a $130,000 payment made to porn star Stormy Daniels.
